awd_titl_txt: Project to Plan the Baltimore Systemic Initiative to Enhance Mathematics and Science Education
awd_abstract_narration: Baltimore proposes to plan for a larger scale initiative to                     address science and mathematics education for low-income,                       and underrepresented groups.  This is a collaborative                           between Morgan State University, the university designated                      by the state to coordinate efforts on urban education, and                      the Baltimore City Public Schools (BCPS).  The goals of the                     proposal are to:  1) strengthen and expand existing                             collaborations to include ALL major players in mathematics                      and science education;  2) complete a comprehensive self-                       study;  and 3) develop a comprehensive design for the                           Baltimore City Initiative.                                                                                                                                      The award period is for 12 months, starting January 15,                         1993.
